entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot find .NET SDK installation from PATH enviroment. #44340
  • Participate `dotnet tool` as first-class resource for DSC operations #44325

Closed

  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Always print manifest versions in workload list command #44339
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [Blazor] Update Microsoft.NET.Sdk.StaticWebAssets.JSModules.targets #44160
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Sync analyzer rules with ASP.NET Core, fix issues and update code to newer C# #44304
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix assembly version diff test for missing file #44333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SB assembly version test #44334
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2565267 #44326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Updated

  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    untriaged, Area-Tools, DO NOT MERGE, Backport when open, 9.0.2xx
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
